name: Extreme Light Infrastructure Delivery Consortium AISBL
goal: The main goal of ELI-DC is to complete ELI's de-centralized implementation while creating all conditions for the future operation of ELI as a single, distributed, international user facility of pan-European dimensions on laser, optics and photonics research.
euInitiatives:
ELI participates in the ESFRI Group, as part of the ESFRI Landmarks.
Also, ELI DC participated in the consultation group during the preparation of the Charter for Access of Research Infrastructures.
Furthermore ELI is member of the ERA Stakeholders Platform and the Association of European-level Research infrastructure Facilities (ERF-AISBL).
ELI is member of the General Assembly of the RESAVER pension scheme, working towards the implementation of a new pan-European 2nd pillar pension system for researchers.
